original_text: When Jacob learned that there was grain in Egypt, he said to his sons, “Why do you just keep looking at each other?”
korean_text: 그 때에 야곱이 애굽에 곡식이 있음을 보고 아들들에게 이르되 너희는 어찌하여 서로 바라보고만 있느냐

sentences.original_text: When Jacob learned that there was grain in Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 이집트에 곡식이 있다는 것을 알았을 때

sentences.original_text: Why do you just keep looking at each other?
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 너희는 서로 그냥 쳐다보고만 있느냐?
